data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Scheme of Arrangement
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulations 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we are enclosing herewith an intimation regarding the effectiveness of the Composite Scheme of Arrangement.

data.caption: Intimation Of Revised Record Date
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulations 30 and 42 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that the Company has revised the Record Date fixed under the Composite Scheme of Arrangement. The revised date is November 12 2025. We request you to kindly take note of the revised record date.

data.caption: Intimation Of Revised Record Date
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulations 30 and 42 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that the Company has revised the Record Date fixed under the Composite Scheme of Arrangement. The revised Record Date is November 12 2025. We request you to kindly take note of the revised record date.

data.caption: Intimation Regarding The Effective Date Under The Composite Scheme Of Arrangement
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulations 30 and 42 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we are enclosing herewith an intimation regarding the effective date and record date under the Composite Scheme of Arrangement.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulations 30(6) read with Schedule III and 46 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith transcript of earnings conference call held on Thursday, June 01, 2023, for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2023.The transcript of recording can also be accessed on the Company''s website, from the below link:https://www.allcargologistics.com/investors/presentationsandtranscripts/calltranscriptsWe request you to take the above on record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulations 30(6) read with Schedule III and 46 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirement) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform you that the audio recording of earnings conference call for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2023 held today i.e., Thursday, June 01, 2023 is available on the website of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30(6) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (the Listing Regulations), read with Part A of Schedule Ill of the Listing Regulations, we are enclosing herewith the Investors Presentation for the Analysts / Institutional Investors meeting to be held on Thursday, June 01, 2023.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body:
With reference to our letters dated May 22, 2023 and May 29, 2023 and in accordance with Regulations 30 and 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, (the Listing Regulations), this is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its Meeting held yesterday i.e. May 29, 2023, inter alia:

a. Mr Shashi Kiran Shetty (DIN:00012754) Chairman & Managing Director of the Company has been designated as Executive Chairman of the Company, based on the recommendation of the Governance and Nomination & Remuneration Committee.

b. Mr Adarsh Hegde (DIN:00035040) Joint Managing Director has been designated as a Managing Director of the Company, based on the recommendation of the Governance and Nomination & Remuneration Committee
